overview:
Say some beguiling words and I am all yours, trust me and I won’t let you down, Confide in me and you will find me better than the rest. I’m the most caring friend of my friends and the worst nightmare of my enemies. An extremely fun loving person … always looking for new experiences … I’m someone whose gonna win your heart- you just need to give me 5 minutes out of your life and I’ll tell you about your nature and personality … an extremist in whatever I do or opt for … a great friend to my old friends and not at all a stranger to my new friends … you can never guess if you’re meeting me for the first time or you already have … and would do anything to save my friend’s pride … Nothing’s impossible for me and I myself is an impossible person … With guts and confidence to do anything within my limits and without disrespecting others … Someone with only positive aspects of life in his mind - I have never considered negative aspects - Someone who lives his life as it comes minute by minute, hour by hour and day by day …

“I’m larger than life and if you look at me right there’s no doubt you’ll assume I’m worth the fight. I dream without ever sleeping. I don’t just exist, I float. I drift on the breeze” and Me a straight forward guy and take intrest to make new friends. Target oriented and find enjoy in very little things and live the life to the fullest. I am happy at small corner where i live, happy with my parents, nice frind, with my will power.
